ENTER
This container is designed to hold several artefacts of low radiation only. For transporting artefacts that are more radioactive, you'll need an upgraded container...
Labelled: Private channel
I got to the apartment. Shadows and Pavel were there, but there was no Cube. I heard news about the night time incident in the laboratory - our friend Karoche went back to the lab and, apparently, never returned... \nOh, and there's something strange - someone's been here recently. I found a military recording. What do you think?
I think 'Get out, now!' That's what! \nYou need to move! We're in trouble - our last conversation was overheard. Maybe someone else knew about the Cube. Maybe it was you who tipped them off? \nThe eastern part of Pripyat's now occupied by an elite group of Mercenaries. They know you're looking for the Soul Cube in the apartment...\nRight. We need to trick them. Are you up for this? You need to send out some disinformation on the Stalker network...\nHere, enter this into your PDA chat console: 'Cube for Sale, belonged to Shadows. The cordon around the Perimeter, in 8 hours.'\nWrite this EXACTLY as I've written, and maybe they'll think you've already taken the Cube out of the area. Good luck...
Shadows: Private channel
Stone Blood on belt
Surplus artefact:
moved from belt to backpack

Kostya: %c[default]Marked One, I've lost my PDA. Please help me find it...
It's stashed with other valuables that are yours to keep - I just need my PDA. It's out there somewhere. Please trust me on this. I'll be in the Garbage if you find it\n

INCOMING: %c[default]Sviblov, we have urgent business. I will wait for you
SIDOROVICH: %c[default]Hey, Marked One, it's your old friend Sidorovich. I have a package for you...
INCOMING: %c[default]AAAARRRRGGGGHHHH!!!
This item isn't necessary...
I already have one of these equipped...
I can't take this. My backpack's full...
I have no use for this...
I'm carrying too much weight...
I can't take this...
In order to take this, I'll need to get rid of something else...
Well, regarding your sidearm
\n \n - Make it more accurate
\n \n - Reduce its weight
, I can't repair it
, I can offer you the following upgrades:
\n ... It'll cost: - %c[255,238,155,23]
\n ... It would cost you: - %c[255,255,32,23]
\n \n - Change the calibre from 5.45x39mm to 5.56x45mm
\n \n - Change the calibre from 5.56x45mm to 5.45x39mm
\n \n - Change the calibre from 9x18mm to 9x19mm
\n \n - Change the calibre from 9x19mm to 9x18mm
, it appears to be damaged\nI can't work on it as it is. Get it repaired, then I can upgrade it
Ah, regarding your primary weapon
roubles%c[default]
roubles%c[default], but you don't appear to have the money...
, I can't repair it
Armor condition:
Agreed?
Come back later, since you appear to be short of cash...
For repairs

To repair
Wow, how did you acquire such a unique weapon? Is this Lanky's work?\nI wouldn't dare attempt to repair it.\nIf you still want it repaired, take it back to him at the Bar.\n He'll take care of it for you
you need to pay me %c[255,238,155,23]
roubles%c[default], but\n you don't appear to have a similar weapon for spare parts

simple as that.\nOkay, here's the deal.\nJust give me %c[255,238,155,23]
